(C1- EU-capability) EU implementation approximation: The EU proposed a set of country reductions to meet the 55% target, based on GDP per capita as well as other unspecified considerations, in two formulations, a “bound” version, with reductions limited between 10% and 50%, and an “unbound” set. We approximate the influence of GDP and the previous ESR reduction targets using a linear model to provide a rough analog of the EU’s capability approach in our interpretation set.
